Reason: The configuration 'inter_dc_stream_throughput_outbound_megabits_per_sec' is classified as performance-sensitive. This classification is based on the fact that this configuration directly impacts the throttling of streaming file transfers between datacenters, which can have a significant effect on system performance at the network level. The code provided includes methods to set and get the value of this configuration, as well as a method to calculate the inter-DC rate in bytes based on the configured throughput value. These operations are time-expensive and memory-expensive, contributing to notable performance variations at the system level.
